## Content Structure
<!-- How should the content be organized? -->

### Proposed Outline
```markdown
1. Overview
   - What is [feature/concept]
   - Why use it
   - Key benefits

2. Prerequisites
   - Required knowledge
   - System requirements
   - Dependencies

3. Getting Started
   - Basic setup
   - First example
   - Common use cases

4. Advanced Usage
   - Complex scenarios
   - Best practices
   - Optimization tips

5. Reference
   - Complete API/config reference
   - Troubleshooting
   - FAQ
```
